formattedAddress: 136 Seaman Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 136 Seaman Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
My little guy has been going to Happy Shiny Faces Daycare since he was 5 months old, he is now 18 months. We were so nervous of the thought of leaving him with someone other than family. We looked at so many different daycares but none made us feel as welcomed and at home like Natalia and family.

My son is so happy there & always so excited every morning to walk in. Everyone that works there does such an amazing job because they love what they do. His day is filled with fun and learning activities weather it is indoors or outdoors. My son speaks and understands both English and Spanish thanks to Happy Shiny Faces Daycare.

I consitantly get compliments on how smart my son is and the things that he does and I sincerely give thanks to Natalia & family!

originalText.text: My son have been a  part of  happy shiny faces daycare since he was 3 month  and  I couldnt ask For more ...even though it was something new to me because my older daughter never went to daycare  I was a bit scare, I can say that it has been  the best decision ever  my son has learned so much , they are  a great team , they treat them with  so much love. they make  parents and Kids feel like home... thank you  nathalia  for providing the best care  to my son.

originalText.text: This is a great place!!! My daughter it's been there since 6 months old. They have great activities for the kids, not as other places that babies are only on the playpan. I can't wait to see her doing the toddler activities when she grow up. If you the the videos on their instagram account you can tell the really learn and have fun. Strongly recommend this place.

originalText.text: My little bundle of joy and no so little anymore started his awesome journey at Happy Shiny Faces in the summer of 2015, I don’t have words for the amazing job this ladies do in the upbringing of my Son both academically and socially but sadly and also very excited  his going to embark in a new journey as a pre-k student very soon but the memories and experiences will last forever and if manage to get a spot take it and you won’t regret.

originalText.text: excellent place!!! they are very professional and careful with children, not only is it a place to leave the child! they care about teaching them new and educational things, it's an excellent alternative to trust them with your children.
